TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SynchronizedCollection`1<T> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<!T>, class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public Class SynchronizedCollection(Of T) Implements ICollection(Of T), IEnumerable(Of T), IList, IList(Of T)

generic <typename T> public ref class SynchronizedCollection : System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IList<T>, System::Collections::IList
type SynchronizedCollection<'T> = class interface IList<'T> interface ICollection<'T> interface seq<'T> interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 包含在具備執行緒安全的集合中做為項目的物件型別。

span.span: The type of object contained as items in the thread-safe collection.

summary.span: 提供具備執行緒安全的集合，其中包含由泛型參數指定做為項目之型別的物件。

span.span: Provides a thread-safe collection that contains objects of a type specified by the generic parameter as elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會將資料儲存在 容器中，並提供可設定及用來同步處理集合之存取的物件，使其具備執行緒安全。The stores data in a container and provides an object that can be set and used to synchronize access to the collection so that it is thread-safe. 使用 方法，可以復原 容器。The container can be recovered using the method. 若使用 屬性，則可以復原同步處理的物件。The synchronized object can be recovered using the property. 它只能使用其中一個採用 `syncRoot` 參數的建構函式來設定。It can only be set using one of the constructors that take the `syncRoot` parameter.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the object used to synchronize access to the thread-safe collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 的多個執行個體都是使用相同的 `syncRoot` 建立，則所有執行個體的存取都會受到保護。If multiple instances of the are created using the same `syncRoot`, then access is protected across all instances.

summary.span: 在指定的索引位置，插入項目至集合之中。

span.span: Inserts an item into the collection at a specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `index` 等於集合中的項目數目，則項目會附加至清單。If the `index` is equal to the number of elements in the collection, the item is appended to the list. 如果 `index` 小於集合中的項目數目，則項目插入點後方的項目會向下移動，以容納新項目。If the `index` is less than the number of elements in the collection, the elements that follow the point of insertion of the item move down to accommodate the new element.

exception.span: 指定的 小於零或大於集合中的項目數。

span.span: The specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.

exception.span: 設定的值為 ，或者不是適用於該集合的正確泛型型別 。

span.span: The value set is or is not of the correct generic type for the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中位於已移除之項目後面的項目會向上移動，以佔用空出的位置，而且其索引也會跟著更新。The elements in the collection that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot and their indices are updated accordingly.

param.span: 要在集合中找出的物件。

span.span: The object to locate in the collection.

summary.span: 判斷集合是否包含具有特定值的項目。

span.span: Determines whether the collection contains an element with a specific value.

returns.span: 如果項目 存在於集合中則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the element is found in the collection; otherwise .

exception.span: 不是包含在集合中之型別的物件。

span.span: is not an object of the type contained in the collection.

span.span: Determines the zero-based index of an element in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: void IList.Insert (int index, object value);
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Collections.IList.Insert(int32 index, object value) cil managed
Sub Insert (index As Integer, value As Object) Implements IList.Insert
virtual void System.Collections.IList.Insert(int index, System::Object ^ value) = System::Collections::IList::Insert;

param.name: index
param.span: 要在該處插入 之以零起始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index at which is to be inserted.

param.name: value
param.span: 要插入集合的物件。

span.span: The object to insert into the collection.

summary.span: 在指定的索引位置，插入物件至集合之中。

span.span: Inserts an object into the collection at a specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `index` 等於集合中的項目數目，則項目會附加至清單。If the `index` is equal to the number of elements in the collection, the item is appended to the list. 如果 `index` 小於集合中的項目數目，則項目插入點後方的項目會向下移動，以容納新項目。If the `index` is less than the number of elements in the collection, the elements that follow the point of insertion of the item move down to accommodate the new element.

exception.span: 指定的 小於零或大於集合中的項目數。

span.span: The specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.

exception.span: 設定的 為 ，或者不是適用於該集合的正確泛型型別 。

span.span: The set is or is not of the correct generic type for the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: bool System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize { get; }
.property instance bool System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize
ReadOnly Property IsFixedSize As Boolean Implements IList.IsFixedSize
property bool System::Collections::IList::IsFixedSize { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值會指出集合是否為固定大小。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection is fixed in size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為可以新增項目至該集合，使其大小不固定，所以這個屬性會傳回 `false`。This property returns `false` because the collection can be added to and so is not fixed in size.

MemberSignature.Value: bool System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly { get; }
.property instance bool System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly
ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean Implements IList.IsReadOnly
property bool System::Collections::IList::IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值會指出集合是否唯讀。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection is read only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為可以新增項目至該集合，使其不屬於唯讀性質，所以這個屬性一律會傳回 `false`。This property always returns `false` because the collection can be added to and so is not read only.

span.span: Gets or sets the item at a specified zero-based index.

value.span: 具有指定之 的項目。

span.span: The item with the specified .

exception.span: 設定的值為 ，或者不是適用於該集合的正確泛型型別 。

span.span: The value set is or is not of the correct generic type for the collection.

exception.span: 指定的 小於零或大於集合中的項目數。

span.span: The specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: void IList.Remove (object value);
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Collections.IList.Remove(object value) cil managed
Sub Remove (value As Object) Implements IList.Remove
virtual void System.Collections.IList.Remove(System::Object ^ value) = System::Collections::IList::Remove;

param.name: value
param.span: 要從集合移除的物件。

span.span: The object to be removed from the collection.

summary.span: 移除集合中第一個出現做為項目的指定物件。

span.span: Removes the first occurrence of a specified object as an element from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中位於已移除之項目後面的項目會向上移動，以佔用空出的位置，而且其索引也會跟著更新。The elements in the collection that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot and their indices are updated accordingly.
